help:
Available commands:
/expense - Record a new expense
/income - Record a new income
/transfer - Record a money transfer between two accounts
/lookup - Get information about your expenses/incomes
/accounts - Get account information
/month_stats - Get information about this month's expenses and incomes
/cancel - Cancel the ongoing operation
/clear_cache - Clear the data cache
/set_locale {locale} - Set bot language
/help - Show the full list of available commands
